ARABIC: قَالَ قَدْ أُجِيبَت دَّعْوَتُكُمَا فَٱسْتَقِيمَا وَلَا تَتَّبِعَآنِّ سَبِيلَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Your request is answered, so go straight and do not follow the way of those who have no knowledge.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Said (the Lord): "Your prayer is answered. Therefore persist and do not follow the path of those who are ignorant."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Allah responded: 'The prayer of the two of you is accepted. So keep steadfast, and do not follow the path of the ignorant.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Lord replied, "Moses, the prayer of your brother and yourself has been heard. Both of you must be steadfast (in your faith) and must not follow the ignorant ones."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “The prayer of you two is accepted, therefore remain firm, and do not follow the way of the unwise.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Allah said: "Verily, the invocation of you both is accepted. So you both keep to the straight way, and follow not the path of those who know not."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: The prayer of you both has indeed been accepted, therefore continue in the right way and do not follow the path of those who do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'Your prayer is answered; so go you straight, and follow not the way of those that know not.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Your prayer is heard. Do ye twain keep to the straight path, and follow not the road of those who have no knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: God said, "Your prayer is granted, so continue, then, both of you, steadfastly on the right path, and do not follow the path of those who have no knowledge."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Allah said: surely the petition of you twain is accepted, so keep straight on, and follow not the path of those who know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Said He, ‘Your supplication has already been granted. So be steadfast, and do not follow the way of those who do not know.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Allah said: "Accepted is your prayer (O Moses and Aaron)! So stand ye straight, and follow not the path of those who know not."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Allah said: "Verily, the invocation of you both is accepted. So you both keep to the Straight Way (i.e. keep on doing good deeds and preaching Allah's Message with patience), and follow not the path of those who know not (the truth i.e. to believe in the Oneness of Allah, and also to believe in the Reward of Allah: Paradise, etc.)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: He (Allah) said: 'Your supplication is answered; so go straight and do not follow the way of those who do not know'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Your prayer has been answered, so go straight, and do not follow the path of those who do not know.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Allah] said, "Your supplication has been answered." So remain on a right course and follow not the way of those who do not know."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [10:89] He, [God] exalted be He, said, ‘Your prayer has been answered: thus their riches were transformed into stones and Pharaoh did not believe until he was about to drown. So the two of you remain upright, with the Message and the Call until such time as chastisement befalls them, and do not follow the way of those who have no knowledge’, when they seek to hasten on My judgement — it is reported that he [Moses] remained [alive] a further forty years thereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Allah said to Moses and Aaron: (Your prayer is heard. Do ye twain keep to the straight path) of faith, obedience of Allah and conveyance of the message, (and follow not the road) the religion (of those who have no knowledge) regarding Allah's divine Oneness and do not believe in Him. The reference here is to Pharaoh and his folk.
